column5: Recently updated 2 BR/2 BA house with new pool, a large great room and screened-in breezeway. The house sits on 15 private acres that provide a quiet Hill Country respite only 10 min. from downtown Wimberley, 20 from Blanco. 45 to Austin, 60 to San Antonio.
column8: Ranch House on 15 acres w/ pool (unheated)
